SEARCH
Package app.entity

Class HumanPlayer

java.lang.Object
app.entity.Player
app.entity.HumanPlayer
public class HumanPlayer extends Player
Represents a human player in the game of Parade. This class handles human player interactions and decisions during their turn.

  • Constructor Summary
